name: Alchemist Card Battle
description:
Made by pol and d0t for 'JamGame mini jam #16'  with Godot

Put your  card on the board, take control of it's avatar and try to beat the IA to win the deck of you opponent

Control| XBOX 360| keyboard

move| L stick| wasd

fire|R stick|arrows

dash|R1/R2trigger/RstickButton| space
